title: BRIEF-NGEx Minerals Announces Option To Buy Valle Ancho Gold Project In Catamarca Province Argentina
text:
BRIEF-NGEx Minerals Announces Option To Buy Valle Ancho Gold Project In Catamarca Province Argentina

Stock Markets 45 minutes ago (Sep 09, 2019 02:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-NGEx Minerals Announces Option To Buy Valle Ancho Gold Project In Catamarca Province Argentina Sept 9 (Reuters) - NGEx Minerals Ltd NGEX.V : * NGEX MINERALS ANNOUNCES OPTION TO ACQUIRE VALLE ANCHO GOLD PROJECT IN CATAMARCA PROVINCE ARGENTINA * OPTION TO ACQUIRE A 100% INTEREST IN VALLE ANCHO GOLD PROJECT BY MAKING $8.2 MILLION IN EXPENDITURES OVER 2 YEARS * NGEX HAS OPTION TO ACQUIRE A 100% INTEREST IN PROJECT BY MAKING $8.2 MILLION IN EXPENDITURES OVER 2 YEARS

BRIEF-NGEx Minerals Announces Option To Buy Valle Ancho Gold Project In Catamarca Province Argentina
description: BRIEF-NGEx Minerals Announces Option To Buy Valle Ancho Gold Project In Catamarca Province Argentina
